A Busy Day

Yo! Well I came through a person's whatsapp story about how people aren't giving any attention to West Bengal's Cyclone Issue (Amphan). It was sad to see that. Coming to the important musings... I just installed evernote sometimes the things get so messed up that I totally get confused up where should I start from. Lets start from the evernote only Its a nice application one should try with many cool ready-made templates. I need something so that I could manage my tutorials, my projects, my priorities, social duties, house choreses, me-time well. Like a weekly schedule typo something or maybe not fuck it. HAHA. I am watching 13 reasons why. How do people judge by the show you are watching, I mean I dont have such fucked up powers TBH. Infact I just watch anything like its totally random for me I wouldn't watch a series for months and then suddenly I be binging over it. Well I need another season of Humourously Yous. It was super awesome. I talked to himnish today kaafi time baad dhang se about how we should make our life more happening lmao. Well, himnish hamesha yaad rakhta hai jo bhi mai kehta hu usse, patanhi kaise but kaafi sahi lagta hai. For example - The story i told him about when I went to IIT roorkee for Josaa counselling and suddenly I was all nostalgic while the car went throught the same road from which I went a year ago to Gurukul Kangri for the same Josaa counselling. Such a jump right xD. Well, I became a lil emotional then when I saw a little smile on Dad's face. Hmmmm, leaving this here only. Well i have finally started with a book infact 2. :) Bhagwad Gita .-. and ofcourse the Kite runner. Next is 11 minutes on the list. haa. Also checkout bruno-simon.com kaafi cool. Lusion.co is another one. Lmao I really like watching cool websites. I guess i am done for today Goodnight.

Not So Bad Day

Haan toh... book padhni hai yaar :'( Wehn Wihl AAhi Beeh Ehble Tuh Duh Wahat I Wahant. Seeet mahn. Haan so Important baat. Mehul yaar roz video call pe samjhata hai nayi nayi cheeze aur mai yahan ek course khatam nahi karr paa raha hu. Mom wants ki mai jaldi uthu and sahi bhi hai kaafi embarrassing feel hota hai when I sleep and wake up multiple times till its 11 in the morning. Feels like a hangover xD. Also, play list banani hai. Dude I seriously need a bucket list like this thing would have been on the top of my bucket list. -___-. Yaman Sir daraa dete hai yaar jab bhi baat karta hu. Future se related. GPA/BIOTECH/Trainging and Placement chronicles etc etc. well sanidhya kitna chill rehta hai yaar. Sahi banda hai. Plus pata nahii ye lockdown kabtakk chalega :/// kuch log toh aise hai jinse mai roz baat karta hu but i havent even seen them yet. FATE I miss Mom and Dad when I am at college so I should spend more time with them while I am here... and i aint doing that much. Hmm from tomorrow I will :) Coming back to the important stuff. Well a girl just told me I am not lazy. hahaha. well sahi hai I am not lazy while lazying over someone. So, coming back to important stuff now. what actually this blog was made for... what i was thinking of a new idea or something right well tbh lately my ideas are mostly limited to some business expansion typo stuff related to some app or website and marketing strategies. From which I want to shift towards some more creative ones. Tabhi toh I want to read books.. Got it now. Muting Instagram and whatsapp provides another sense of peace and satisfaction lmao validation too :P Well not really itne texts nahi aatei mujhe :/ . Well aaj archit ne ek video bheji dhruv rathi ki group pe idk kitna sach hai ofc BJP opposing tho uske saarei videos asie hi hote hai ab Ojaswa ispe kuch apne not so necessary trashy opinions dedega lol. I am so out of all this now. Already Done that not a fan type vaali cheez hai i am just happy with the opinions I have and I will change them whenever I want just by listening two to three not so intelligent people quarrel over some not so important matter. Well whats more important that RDJ not making Iron Man 4 right. Media kuch bhi kehti hai. Isliye I have muted Ojaswa way back :PP Well to end with the day I have an intersting not so funny one-liner :P I cut my finger today On the other hand I am okay. :) Bye

A day well spent

But the theme was a pretty one TBH. Reading the story of someone to the same person and by the end I was shedding tears... Well no further spoilers. Uhm So IIT D Marketplace ka kaam finally shuru hua meri side se and Om ne kaafi kaam pehele hi karr diya thaa I will now make it look good and create the rest of the components. Well Shubham kaafi ajeeb insaan hai yaar. Om aur mai discuss karr rahe thei A complete Asshole he is! Leave it here, hmm mom ke saath bade time se koi movie nahi dekhi soch raha hu koi dekhleta hu kal. Mom ko Ozark kaafi pasand aagaya hai vaise bhi toh sahi hi hai.

A Busy Day

Well, log kitna kuch karr rahe hai yaar life meh. It makes me go all tired even thinking about what's more left to learn. So in the end I just prefer to sleep.💁 Well, nothing much happened today, saw some nice designs and illustrations on Instagram. Got a glimpse of some Tik-Tok Vs YouTube on Hostel Informal Group. Well, interesting issue right, tho that Bhishm Pitamaha Vs Jesus christ's meme is quite funny so is this issue... Coming to more important and genuine topic of the hour. Another cyclone might hit the shores of Orissa. Sad right! Yeah well one can say 2020 is cursed infact people are already saying that so let's not follow the crowd and rather say "Try to play the orchestra". Lmao, Context... Haan well who knows maybe I too forget what this line was all about isliye hi toh ye blog hai 💁As an escape to the biji schedule and spend my #metime. So this is a line from Steve Job's movie cum documentory in which he tells Steve Wozniak, "You may be the best Musician in your line but I, I am the one who plays Orchestra". Cool right? True too. I dont know how to relate this to the modern world scenario maybe I haven't experienced it yet... But it gives me Goosebumps each time I think about it. another imp concern of the hour QuaranTeach, Umm so far so good but what to do next?? I am open to suggestions about this please. Book bhi padhni hai kabse hi standy pe hai. I so want to read books and novels but idk why I feel that there are more important things to do than that. Aaj meri Inglis ka mazzak udaya Prateek Himmi ne LOL. Well I was trynna roast someone and uske excitement mei kuch bhi blabber kardiya vaise sirf do words ki BT thi lekin theek hai ab unki baat ka bura bhi toh nahi lagta. Harshit Busy rehta hai aajkal. Ishita ki Mom ka bday hai aaj, it must be hard being a single parent I do feel bad for her but couldn't gather strngth to talk about. Raman called too today💁 I am sad I am unable to give the time to the project we decided to work upon but kya kar sakte hai. Priortize toh karna padega. Plus CreatoSpace Meetz Hackathon mei slect nahi hui :(( It made me pretty sad kaafi padha thaa yaar uske liye but ab kya hi karr sakte hai. SomeHow my wynk got updated and all I am listening to are some of the nicest songs I have ever heard. So TATA I am off to bed now :3 SHIT yaad aaya Mehul kya hi masst banda hai yaar sahi aadmi hai kaafi kuch aata hai and idk how but voh impressed hai mujhse looks like I got a mentor. :p bass saala 4 baje takk jagata hai aur faaltu ka dikhawa kardeta hai beech beech mei :(

A Day OFF 🌞

I am waking up early these days. Its a nice feeling to get up before Sun. Gives a sense of satisfaction. Sometimes I wonder how we people connect a memory with the aroma of the air, and then it suddenly turns on the page of the day you felt the same aroma. Its just awesome sometimes to Reminscate the day, even if something special didnt happen but the feeling is awesome. Finally I had Pizza today after like 2-3 months had to call Mom and Dad hypocrite for that as they were cool in eating Kachori but not Dominos Pizza💁. Sorry for that :P Watched Mirage today was a nice movie infact second movie I watched on ButterFly effect. Quite a crazy paradox lures me each time I read about it. Predestination Paradox is the other crazy and interesting one. These phenomenons/paradoxes based on Causal Loops are a pretty nice source for the Hollywood Movies also topics you can study for hours about atleast for me. Also just yaad aaya pichle saal iss time alag hi BT rehti thi harr time. Well JEE Adv was just a few days far. Himnish se badi serious baatei bhi ho rahi thi kal Infact pichle saal bhi Prateek Himnish Harshit se advice leta rehta thaa mai iss time.

    An Embarassing Day

    Well, the day was going great untill one of the most embarassing things happened to me, and I had nothing to do with it but in the end it was me who ended up getting up embarassed. So, the thing was... I uploaded the poster for QuaranTeach on instagram made by Sahil. Updated the Bio and the response of the page was coming pretty nice untill.. one of the core member of CovEd texts a Hi! okay i got excited TBH as one of the similar organisation was texting, and maybe they might be having plans of collab and stuff, so according to him the content written in the poster was copied from one of the poster of CovEd. He said "I appreciate the initiative by you BUT 'PLEASE DO NOT COPY'. Well I was kind of busy and didnt even read what was in the poster and turns out he was totally right :( I became both super furious and embarassed, side by side several people started texting QuaranTeach mentors about the copied content :/. I didnt had to do anything with me but in the end it was me who had to face embarassment of someone else's stupidity.

    #Musings 01 Perspective and People

    I guess I have been messing up with the time a lot lately, like both CreatoSpace and MissionED are big projects and I haven't made any significant progress in CreatoSpace since long. Plus I dont like it when the people are on low enthu, "People" right here the things go wrong when you start to get affected how and what people are doing around you. Well, 'Perspective' is another word to ponder about atleast for me! I have been lately looking things through the 'perspective' of the one who I have been talking to too. LOL, pros and cons exist here too. ._. Maybe, the 'people' I have met in my past have made me so... like this "ALL MESSED UP". Pondering about small things and not letting go full of myself. Well, long story I guess. Let's leave it for later.
